title: Trump administration withholds about $27 million for N.H. schools - The Boston Globe
description: “We can’t wait while the government plays with impoundment,” said the president of a New Hampshire teacher’s union.

name: Pennsylvania
title: New income guidelines announced for free, reduced school meals in Pennsylvania
description: PENNSYLVANIA (WTAJ) — The new income guidelines for free and reduced-price school lunches have been released ahead of the 2025-26 school year. name: Oklahoma
title: Oklahoma's Lunch Plan Sparks Debate Over School Funding And Admin Salaries
description: Oklahoma's schools are in the spotlight as Superintendent Ryan Walters proposes free lunches for all students, raising eyebrows over funding and the soaring salaries of school administrators.

name: Pennsylvania
title: Pennsylvania releases new eligibility requirements for free and reduced school meals
description: (WHTM) — The Pennsylvania Department of Education unveiled new eligibility guidelines for free and reduced school meals. The guidelines, set by the United States Department of Agriculture, govern eligibility for federal breakfast and lunch programs. Those programs include the National School Lunch Program, the School Breakfast Program, the Special Milk Program for Children, the Child […]

name: Oklahoma
title: Oklahoma schools ordered to fund free student meals with no new funding
description: Oklahoma State Department of Education mandates free school meals for all students without additional funding- critics question its feasibility.

name: Education Funding
title: Federal funding freeze threatens summer, after‑school programs in Missouri
description: A federal funding freeze puts Mid-Missouri Boys & Girls Clubs at risk.

name: Oklahoma
title: Oklahoma superintendent orders all districts to offer free meals
description: OKLAHOMA CITY — All public schools in Oklahoma must pay for free cafeteria meals for every student and exclude certain dyes and processed foods, the state’s top education official ordered.

name: Alabama
title: Trump Freezes Over $6 Billion in Education Funding in Latest Attack on Working Class - Left Voice
description: The Trump admission has frozen over $6 billion to public schools to review for “radical leftwing agendas” — while greenlighting hundreds of billions for war and deportations. Unions must mobilize to fight funding freezes, resist privatization and cuts, and defend our schools and communities.
